attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown does not appear to feel obliged honour promises he makes to the electorate.  Mr Brown made a promise during Prime Minister's Questions on July 16th 2008 not to raise fuel duty for a year.  Mr Brown broke this promise in December 2008 when he added 2 pence per litre to fuel duty. He is set to break the promise for a second time on April 1st when fuel duty on unleaded and diesel will rise yet again.
Mr Brown, you made a promise - please keep it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
